tuv.seg: The Intoxicating Liquor Act 1988 (Age Card) Regulations 2007 provide for a voluntary Age Card scheme in Ireland
Ceadaíonn an tAcht um Dheochanna Meisciúla 1988 (Aoischárta) Rialacha 2007 scéim roghnach aoischárta náisiúnta
Age Cards can be obtained by individuals in Ireland aged 18 and over to show that they have reached the legal age for purchasing alcohol
Is féidir le daoine 18 bliain d'aois agus os a cionn aoischárta a fháil chun dearbhú go bhfuil an aois dleathach sroichte acu chun deochanna meisciúla a cheannach
This card is a proof of age card and is not an identity card
Is cárta chruthúnas aoise é an Cárta seo agus ní cárta aitheantais é
In fact, the card can only be used to show you have reached the legal age for purchasing alcohol
Go deimhin, ní féidir ach an Cárta a úsáid chun a thaispeáint go bhfuil an t-aois dlíthiúil le halcól a cheannach bainte amach agat
It should not be obtained or used for any other purpose
Níor cheart é a fháil nó a úsáid chun aon chríche eile
If you live in Ireland and have reached 18 years, you can apply for an Age Card
Má tá tú 18 bliain d'aois is féidir leat iarratas a dhéanamh ar aoischárta
When applying for an Age Card you will require:
Nuair a bheidh tú ag déanamh iarratais ar Aoischárta, beidh na rudaí seo a leanas ag teastáil uait:
• Your birth certificate, your passport or your GNIB (Garda National Immigration Bureau) Card
• Do theastas breithe, do phas nó do GNIB (Biúró Náisiúnta Inimirce an Biúró) Cárta
• One other form of identification
• Foirm amháin eile aitheantais
• A credit/debit card or an Age Card voucher (available from any post office)
• Cárta creidmheasa/dochair nó dearbhán aoischárta (ar fáil ó oifig an phoist ar bith)
• A photograph identifying you
• Griangraf a chruthaíonn cé thú féin
• Relevant security features (such as a metal hologram, embossed symbol, encoded magnetic stripe, etc.)
• Gné slándála, (m.sh. hologram)
Replacing a lost or misplaced Age Card
Athchur Chárta Aoise Náisiúnta ar caillte/ligthe amú é
If you have lost your Age Card, the application process to replace your card is the same as for a new Age Card (see 'How to apply' below)
Má tá d’Aoischárta Náisiúnta caillte agat, tá an próiseas iarratais chun do Chárta a ionadú mar an gcéanna le haghaidh Aoischárta nua (féach ‘Conas iarratas a dhéanamh’ thíos)
You will be required to make a report on the loss or theft of your original card when presenting your application for authentication at your local Garda Station
Beidh ort tuairisc a dhéanamh ar chaillteanas nó ar ghoid do Chárta bunaidh agus d'iarratas á thabhairt ar fhíordheimhniú agat ag do Stáisiún Gardaí áitiúil
There is a charge of €10 for a replacement Age Card
Tá táille de €10 chun Aoischárta Náisiúnta a ionadú
A replacement National Age Card also costs €10
Cosnaíonn Cárta Aoise Náisiúnta ionaid €10
You are required to pay online when you are applying for an Age Card
Tá ort íoc ar líne nuair atá tú ag déanamh iarratais ar Aoischárta
You can do this using a debit or credit card, or an age card voucher which you can purchase in any post office
Is féidir leat é seo a dhéanamh trí úsáid a bhaint as cárta creidmheasa, nó dearbhán aoischárta gur féidir leat a cheannach in oifig an phoist ar bith
You can apply and pay for your Age Card online at www.agecard.ie
Déanann tú iarratas ar agus íocann tú as d’Aoischárta ar líne ag www.agecard.ie
Within 3 working days of applying you will receive an application form containing your details
Laistigh de trí lá oibre tar éis duit iarratas a dhéanamh, gheobhaidh tú foirm iarratais le do chuid sonraí
You must take the application form, along with your photograph and proofs of identity to your local Garda Station for authentication within 3 months
Ní mór duit an fhoirm iarratais, mar aon le do ghrianghraf agus cruthúnais aitheantais a thógáil chuig do Stáisiún Garda áitiúil le haghaidh fíordheimhnithe laistigh de thrí mhí
The Garda Station will forward your application form and photograph to the printers and you will receive your Age Card within 10 working days
Seolfaidh an Stáisiún Garda d'fhoirm iarratais agus grianghraf ar aghaidh chuig na clódóirí agus gheobhaidh tú d’Aoischárta laistigh de 10 lá oibre
You can track your application online provided you know your 6-digit application form number
Is féidir leat d’iarratas a rianú ar líne ar choinníoll go bhfuil d'uimhir fhoirm iarratais 6-dhigit
You apply online for your Age Card at www.agecard.ie
Déanann tú iarratas ar d’Aoischárta ar líne ag www.agecard.ie
The website has an FAQ section with further information
Tá Ceisteanna Coitianta mar aon le tuilleadh eolais ar fáil ar an suíomh gréasáin
